Detail: Replaced form: this.emptyForm() with inline object literal in Alpine data. this is undefined during object construction — crashed entire component preventing data fetch & render.

Task: Add sticky header with hamburger menu
Detail: Added standard <header class=sticky top-0 z-40> with hamburger button (@click=sidebarOpen=true) for mobile sidebar toggle. Matches daftar.blade.php and laporan-perolehan patterns.
Replaced <div class=max-w-full> with <div class=p-4 md:p-6 space-y-5> matching other pages' standard layout.
Moved loading overlay + form modal (z-[80]) + delete modal (z-[90]) + toast (z-[100]) from main slot to @push('before-sidebar'). Proper z-index layering above sidebar.
Removed .stat-card duplicate (already in shared.css). Removed .growth-up/.growth-down classes (replaced with inline Tailwind classes for growth indicators).
Redesigned to match rounded-2xl pattern. Added growth indicators with x-if templates for positive/negative/stable states using nullish coalescing.
Changed toLocaleString() to toLocaleString('id-ID') for proper Indonesian number formatting throughout.
